name: Geof Huth
bio: Geof Huth is a poet and visual poet who writes daily on visual poetry and related matters at dbqp.blogspot.com. His recent books are Out of Character (Paper Kite Press, 2008), Longfellow Memoranda (Otoliths, 2008), and texistence (co-written with mIEKAL aND, from Xexox Sutra Editions, 2008.
